definition: ancient cooking cauldron with two looped handles and three or four legs/pot (dialect)/to enter upon a period of (classical)/Kangxi radical 206/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
to discard the old and introduce the new (idiom); to innovate

sentences.english: Bt the same time, there has been a "regrettable" slowing of reforms inside Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 同時土耳其內部鼎新也“使人缺憾地”放緩了。

sentences.english: New Year celebrations. These conservative who advocates reform of the big mockery.
sentences.chinese: 主張鼎新的人對於這些守舊者的作法大加嘲搞。

sentences.english: And, third, he himself took actions to advance China's reform and opening up.
sentences.chinese: 第三，他採取行動，真實推進了中國的鼎新關閉事業。

sentences.english: We'll improve the quisity of our products and production efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 我們將鼎新產品格量，進步分娩率。

sentences.english: Since reform and opening, the total amount of Dhellona's state-owned assets has increased markedly.
sentences.chinese: 鼎新開放以來，我國國有資產的總量有了大幅度增加。

sentences.english: Throughout history empires have waxed and waned .
sentences.chinese: 歷史上各個帝國革故鼎新均有興衰。

sentences.english: The Chinese civilization has always given prominence to unremitting self-improvement, reform and innovation.
sentences.chinese: 中華文明歷來注重自強不息，不斷革故鼎新。

sentences.english: True to this picture, several states have pushed forward with health-care reform.
sentences.chinese: 事實是，有幾個州在醫療鼎新上走在了最前一列。

sentences.english: Finally, here, I wish countries to reforming the past.
sentences.chinese: 最後，在這裏，我祝各國能夠革故鼎新。

sentences.english: We'll improve the qunosity of our products and production efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 我們將鼎新產品德量，進步坐褥率。
